EmailTemplate.description: Welcome email for Export.gov new users
EmailTemplate.name: Trade Community - Welcome - Export.gov
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Target_User.FirstName}, Welcome to Export.gov
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome {!Target_User.FirstName},
We're glad you've joined our International Trade Administration Community!
Your Username is: {!Target_User.Username}
As a registered community member of Export.gov, you can:
Save market intelligence and how-to articles to your boards Get help with trade problems Search our repository of local and international trade events
You now have access ITA's family of websites:
Thanks for joining!
- Trade Community Team
